casebody.data:
Richard ULRICH, Appellant
v.
Governor Tom WOLF, Secretary John Wetzel, Superintendent Tammy Ferguson, Appellees. No. 2 WAP 2016. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Aug. 15, 2016.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

AND NOW, this 15th day of August, 2016, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
